# NYC Claw

> In-person AI assistant setup for NYC executives, powered by OpenClaw.

NYC Claw deploys OpenClaw — an open-source AI assistant that connects to ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Grok, and local models — directly on clients' devices. White-glove service for busy professionals who want AI that works without the technical setup.

## Services

- Discovery Call ($50): 30-minute workflow analysis and AI recommendations
- Remote Setup ($1,200): Full OpenClaw deployment via screen share
- In-Person NYC ($2,400): On-site setup at your NYC office or home

## Community

- Weekly newsletter with AI workflow tips
- Monthly NYC meetups for OpenClaw users
- Discord community (coming soon)

## Links

- Website: https://nycclaw.com
- Detailed info: https://nycclaw.com/llms-full.txt
